Losses¶

RelevanceLossBase¶

class ml4ir.base.model.losses.loss_base.RelevanceLossBase¶

Bases: object

Defines the loss and last layer activation function used and required by the ml4ir.base.model.relevance_model.RelevanceModel.

get_final_activation_op()¶

Returns the final activation layer

get_loss_fn(**kwargs)¶

Returns the loss function _loss_fn()
